title: Damping of acoustic vibrations in gold nanoparticles
title_cn: 金纳米粒子中声振动的阻尼
abstract: Studies of acoustic vibrations in nanometre-scale particles can provide fundamental insights into the mechanical properties of materials because it is possible to precisely characterize and control the crystallinity and geometry of such nanostructures. Metal nanoparticles are of particular interest because they allow the use of ultrafast laser pulses to generate and probe high-frequency acoustic vibrations, which have the potential to be used in a variety of sensing applications. So far, the decay of these vibrations has been dominated by dephasing due to variations in nanoparticle size. Such inhomogeneities can be eliminated by performing measurements on single nanoparticles deposited on a substrate, but unknown interactions between the nanoparticles and the substrate make it difficult to interpret the results of such experiments. Here, we show that the effects of inhomogeneous damping can be reduced by using bipyramidal gold nanoparticles with highly uniform sizes. The inferred homogeneous damping is due to the combination of damping intrinsic to the nanoparticles and the surrounding solvent; the latter is quantitatively described by a parameter-free model.
abstract_cn: 纳米级颗粒中的声振动研究可以为材料的机械性能提供基本的见识，因为可以精确地表征和控制此类纳米结构的结晶度和几何形状。金属纳米颗粒特别受关注，因为它们允许使用超快激光脉冲来生成和探测高频声振动，这些振动有可能在各种传感应用中使用。迄今为止，由于纳米颗粒尺寸的变化，这些振动的衰减已被相移控制。通过对沉积在基板上的单个纳米颗粒进行测量，可以消除这种不均匀性，但是纳米颗粒与基板之间的未知相互作用使得难以解释此类实验的结果。在这里，我们表明可以通过使用具有高度均匀尺寸的双锥体金纳米颗粒来减少不均匀阻尼的影响。推断出的均匀阻尼是由于纳米颗粒固有的阻尼和周围溶剂的组合所致。后者由无参数模型定量描述。

title: Optical nanocrystallography with tip-enhanced phonon Raman spectroscopy
title_cn: 具有尖端声子拉曼光谱的光学纳米晶体学
abstract: Conventional phonon Raman spectroscopy is a powerful experimental technique for the study of crystalline solids that allows crystallography, phase and domain identification on length scales down to ∼1 µm. Here we demonstrate the extension of tip-enhanced Raman spectroscopy to optical crystallography on the nanoscale by identifying intrinsic ferroelectric domains of individual BaTiO3 nanocrystals through selective probing of different transverse optical phonon modes in the system. The technique is generally applicable for most crystal classes, and for example, structural inhomogeneities, phase transitions, ferroic order and related finite-size effects occurring on nanometre length scales can be studied with simultaneous symmetry selectivity, nanoscale sensitivity and chemical specificity.
abstract_cn: 常规声子拉曼光谱法是用于研究结晶固体的强大实验技术，它可以使晶体学，相和畴识别的长度尺度减小到＆＃8764; 1＆＃181; m。 在这里，我们通过选择性探测系统中不同的横向光学声子模式，来识别各个BaTiO 3 纳米晶体的固有铁电畴，从而证明了尖端增强拉曼光谱技术在纳米尺度上的扩展。 该技术通常适用于大多数晶体类型，例如，可以同时对称选择性，纳米级灵敏度和化学特异性研究结构不均匀性，相变，铁素体有序以及在纳米级尺度上发生的相关有限尺寸效应。

title: Structural transformations in graphene studied with high spatial and temporal resolution
title_cn: 高时空分辨率研究石墨烯的结构转变
abstract: Graphene has remarkable electronic properties, such as ballistic transport and quantum Hall effects, and has also been used as a support for samples in high-resolution transmission electron microscopy and as a transparent electrode in photovoltaic devices. There is now a demand for techniques that can manipulate the structural and physical properties of graphene, in conjunction with the facility to monitor the changes in situ with atomic precision. Here, we show that irradiation with an 80 kV electron beam can selectively remove monolayers in few-layer graphene sheets by means of electron-beam-induced sputtering. Aberration-corrected, low-voltage, high-resolution transmission electron microscopy with sub-ångström resolution is used to examine the structural reconstruction occurring at the single atomic level. We find preferential termination for graphene layers along the zigzag orientation for large hole sizes. The temporal resolution can also be reduced to 80 ms, enabling real-time observation of the reconstruction of carbon atoms during the sputtering process. We also report electron-beam-induced rapid displacement of monolayers, fast elastic distortions and flexible bending at the edges of graphene sheets. These results reveal how energy transfer from the electron beam to few-layer graphene sheets leads to unique structural transformations.
abstract_cn: 石墨烯具有非凡的电子性能，例如弹道运输和量子霍耳效应，还已被用作高分辨率透射电子显微镜中样品的载体和光伏器件中的透明电极。现在，需要一种能够操纵石墨烯的结构和物理特性的技术，以及以原子精度监控原位变化的设备。在这里，我们表明用80 kV电子束照射可以通过电子束诱导溅射选择性地去除几层石墨烯片中的单层。分辨率小于亚ngstr＆＃246; m的像差校正，低电压，高分辨率透射电子显微镜用于检查在单个原子级发生的结构重建。我们发现，对于大孔尺寸，沿之字形取向的石墨烯层优先终止。时间分辨率也可以降低到80毫秒，从而可以在溅射过程中实时观察碳原子的重构。我们还报告了电子束诱导的单层快速位移，快速的弹性变形和石墨烯片边缘的柔性弯曲。这些结果揭示了能量从电子束转移到多层石墨烯片如何导致独特的结构转变。</ p>

title: Measurement of the quantum capacitance of graphene
title_cn: 石墨烯量子电容的测量
abstract: Graphene has received widespread attention due to its unique electronic properties. Much of the research conducted so far has focused on electron mobility, which is determined by scattering from charged impurities and other inhomogeneities. However, another important quantity, the quantum capacitance, has been largely overlooked. Here, we report a direct measurement of the quantum capacitance of graphene as a function of gate potential using a three-electrode electrochemical configuration. The quantum capacitance has a non-zero minimum at the Dirac point and a linear increase on both sides of the minimum with relatively small slopes. Our findings—which are not predicted by theory for ideal graphene—suggest that charged impurities also influences the quantum capacitance. We also measured the capacitance in aqueous solutions at different ionic concentrations, and our results strongly indicate that the long-standing puzzle about the interfacial capacitance in carbon-based electrodes has a quantum origin.
abstract_cn: 石墨烯因其独特的电子性能而受到广泛关注。迄今为止，许多研究集中在电子迁移率上，这是由带电杂质和其他不均匀性引起的散射所决定的。但是，另一个重要的量，即量子电容，已被大大忽略。在这里，我们报告使用三电极电化学配置直接测量石墨烯的量子电容与栅极电势的关系。量子电容在狄拉克点处具有非零的最小值，并且在最小值的两侧具有相对较小的斜率线性增加。理论上对于理想的石墨烯并没有预测到我们的发现，建议带电杂质也会影响量子电容。我们还测量了不同离子浓度下水溶液的电容，结果强烈表明，关于碳基电极的界面电容的长期存在的谜题是量子起源的。

title: Tunable optical forces between nanophotonic waveguides
title_cn: 纳米光子波导之间的可调光力
abstract: The confinement of light in components with nanoscale cross-sections in nanophotonic circuits significantly enhances the magnitude of the optical forces experienced by these components. Here we demonstrate optical gradient forces between two nanophotonic waveguides, and show that the sign of the force can be tuned from attractive to repulsive by controlling the relative phase of the optical fields injected into the waveguides. The optical gradient force could have applications in optically tunable microphotonic devices and nanomechanical systems.
abstract_cn: 将光限制在纳米光子电路中具有纳米级横截面的组件中会大大增强这些组件所经历的光学力的大小。 在这里，我们演示了两个纳米光子波导之间的光学梯度力，并表明可以通过控制注入到波导中的光场的相对相位，将力的符号从吸引状态调整为排斥状态。 光学梯度力可能在光学可调微光子器件和纳米机械系统中具有应用。

title: Determination of protein structural flexibility by microsecond force spectroscopy
title_cn: 微秒力光谱法测定蛋白质的结构柔性
abstract: Proteins are dynamic molecular machines having structural flexibility that allows conformational changes. Current methods for the determination of protein flexibility rely mainly on the measurement of thermal fluctuations and disorder in protein conformations and tend to be experimentally challenging. Moreover, they reflect atomic fluctuations on picosecond timescales, whereas the large conformational changes in proteins typically happen on micro- to millisecond timescales. Here, we directly determine the flexibility of bacteriorhodopsin—a protein that uses the energy in light to move protons across cell membranes—at the microsecond timescale by monitoring force-induced deformations across the protein structure with a technique based on atomic force microscopy. In contrast to existing methods, the deformations we measure involve a collective response of protein residues and operate under physiologically relevant conditions with native proteins.
abstract_cn: 蛋白是具有结构柔性的动态分子机器，其允许构象变化。 用于确定蛋白质柔韧性的当前方法主要依赖于对蛋白质构象的热波动和紊乱的测量，并且往往在实验上具有挑战性。 此外，它们反映了皮秒级时标上的原子波动，而蛋白质的大构象变化通常发生在微秒至毫秒级上。 在这里，我们通过基于原子力的技术监测力诱导的跨蛋白质结构的变形，从而直接确定细菌视紫红质的柔韧性，该蛋白质利用光能使质子在微秒级的时间跨细胞膜移动。 显微镜检查。 与现有方法相比，我们测量的变形涉及蛋白质残基的集体响应，并在生理相关条件下使用天然蛋白质进行操作。</ p>

title: Partial sequencing of a single DNA molecule with a scanning tunnelling microscope
title_cn: 使用扫描隧道显微镜对单个DNA分子进行部分测序
abstract: The scanning tunnelling microscope is capable of the real-space imaging and spectroscopy of molecules on an atomic scale. Numerous attempts have been made to use the scanning tunnelling microscope to sequence single DNA molecules, but difficulties in preparing samples of long-chain DNA molecules on surfaces, and problems in reproducing results have limited these experiments. Here, we report single-molecule DNA sequencing with a scanning tunnelling microscope by using an oblique pulse-injection method to deposit the molecules onto a copper surface. First, we show that guanine bases have a distinct electronic state that allows them to be distinguished from the other nucleic acid bases. Then, by comparing data on M13mp18, a single-stranded phage DNA, with a known base sequence, the ‘electronic fingerprint’ of guanine bases in the DNA molecule is identified. These results show that it is possible to sequence individual guanine bases in real long-chain DNA molecules with high-resolution scanning tunnelling microscope imaging and spectroscopy.
abstract_cn: 扫描隧道显微镜能够对原子级的分子进行真实空间成像和光谱分析。已经进行了许多尝试使用扫描隧道显微镜对单个DNA分子进行测序，但是在表面上制备长链DNA分子样品的困难以及再现结果的问题限制了这些实验。在这里，我们报道了通过使用倾斜脉冲注射法将分子沉积到铜表面上的扫描隧道显微镜，对单分子DNA进行测序。首先，我们表明鸟嘌呤碱基具有独特的电子状态，使它们能够与其他核酸碱基区分开。然后，通过比较M13mp18上的数据，该单链噬菌体DNA具有已知的碱基序列，即“电子指纹”。鉴定DNA分子中鸟嘌呤碱基的序列。这些结果表明，利用高分辨率扫描隧道显微镜成像和光谱法，可以对真实的长链DNA分子中的鸟嘌呤碱基进行测序。

title: Evidence of intrinsic ferromagnetism in individual dilute magnetic semiconducting nanostructures
title_cn: 单个稀磁半导体纳米结构中本征铁磁性的证据
abstract: Semiconductors doped with magnetic ions, also known as dilute magnetic semiconductors, are both semiconducting and ferromagnetic. It remains unclear, however, whether this ferromagnetism is intrinsic, as is required for spintronic applications, or is due instead to dopant clustering. Here, we report conclusive evidence for intrinsic ferromagnetism in individual ZnO nanoparticles doped with transition metal ions. Through a simultaneous magnetic and microstructural characterization using electron magnetic chiral dichroism and channelling-enhanced electron energy loss microanalysis, respectively, we show that ZnO nanoparticles have intrinsic ferromagnetism when doped with cobalt, but not when doped with iron.
abstract_cn: 掺杂有磁性离子的半导体（也称为稀磁半导体）既是半导体的又是铁磁性的。 然而，仍然不清楚这种铁磁性是固有的，如自旋电子学应用所要求的，还是是由于掺杂剂聚集引起的。 在这里，我们报告了掺杂过渡金属离子的单个ZnO纳米颗粒中固有铁磁性的确凿证据。 通过分别使用电磁手性二色性和通道增强型电子能量损失微分析同时进行磁性和微观结构表征，我们发现ZnO纳米颗粒在掺杂钴时具有内在铁磁性，而在掺杂铁时则没有。</ p>

title: Phase-locking of magnetic vortices mediated by antivortices
title_cn: 反涡旋介导的磁涡旋的锁相
abstract: Synchronized spin-valve oscillators may lead to nanosized microwave generators that do not require discrete elements such as capacitors or inductors. Uniformly magnetized oscillators have been synchronized, but offer low power. Gyrating magnetic vortices offer greater power, but vortex synchronization has yet to be demonstrated. Here we find that vortices can interact with each other through the mediation of antivortices, leading to synchronization when they are closely spaced. The synchronization does not require a magnetic field, making the system attractive for electronic device integration. Also, because each vortex is a topological soliton, this work presents a model experimental system for the study of interacting solitons.
abstract_cn: 同步自旋阀振荡器可能会导致纳米级微波发生器，这些发生器不需要分立元件，例如电容器或电感器。 均匀磁化的振荡器已经同步，但功耗低。 旋转磁涡流可提供更大的功率，但涡流同步尚未得到证实。 在这里，我们发现涡旋可以通过反涡旋的相互影响而相互作用，当它们间隔很近时会导致同步。 同步不需要磁场，从而使系统吸引了电子设备的集成。 另外，由于每个涡旋都是拓扑孤子，因此，本研究提出了一个用于研究相互作用孤子的模型实验系统。
